Name: ShiroKuro's Adventure
About the game: 'Shirokuro's Adventure' is a top-down action mini-game where you can control two characters at the same time. Control the cute twin characters 'Shiro' and 'Kuro' to aim for the inner part of the island! - Simple action game - Controll two characters at the same time with one controller - Brain training & real-time attack #ShiroKuroAdv #ShiroKuroAdvRTA
